node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `podcast` ( `podcast_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `description` text NOT NULL, `link` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `pubdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `announcement` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createdby_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`podcast_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: podcast
